row.label: Row Anchor
row.help: Example: enter ‘about’ as row anchor and add ‘#about’ link in menu link. When the link is clicked, it will scroll to this row(learn more).

image.label: Alt Tag
image.help: Optional: Image alt is the image "alt" attribute. Primarily used for SEO describing the image.

options.label: Nofollow
options.help: If nofollow is enabled, search engines won't crawl this link.

accordion.label: FAQ Schema
accordion.help: Only enable this schema data option if you are using Accordion for FAQ.

options.label: Toggle Mode
options.help: Toggle means only clicked is toggled. Accordion will collapse all, but keep clicked item expanded.

options.label: Limit Display
options.help: Enter the number of times that this alert should show.

options.value: Display main & sub heading as one line

required.message: Please select a Layout Part. If you don't have any, add a new Layout Part

link-block.label: Nofollow
link-block.help: If nofollow is enabled, search engines won't crawl this link.

link-block.label: Title Attribute
link-block.help: Title attribute is for web accessibility purpose to describe the link.

login.label: Logged In Message
login.help: Message to show if visitor is logged in

options.label: Redirect URL
options.help: Redirect to this URL after successful login

options.label: Redirect URL on Error
options.help: Redirect to this URL after unsuccessful login.

options.label: Fail Message
options.after: Message to show when login fails.

options.label: Redirect URL
options.help: Redirect to this URL after password reset form submission

map.label: Lat/Long
map.help: To use Lat/Long (eg. 43.6453137,-79.3918391) instead of address, leave address field empty.

options.label: Info Window
options.help: Additional info that will be shown when clicking on map marker

options.label: Default First Name
options.help: Default name is recommended as some newsletter providers do not subscribe email address without a name.

required.message: Please select a Layout Part. If you don't have any, add a new Layout Part

plain-text.label: Content Formatting
plain-text.help: Enable for shortcodes, embeds and other text formatting. Disable for custom HTML, <script>, <style> tags.

post.label: Masonry Layout
post.wrap_class: tb_group_element_grid6 tb_group_element_grid5 tb_group_element_grid4 tb_group_element_grid3 tb_group_element_grid2 tb_group_element_list-large-image

post.label: Number of Posts
post.help: Enter the number of posts to display.

post.label: Offset
post.help: Enter number of posts to pass over (skip).

post.label: Order
post.help: Sort posts in ascending or descending order.

post.label: Hide Empty Module
post.help: Hide the module when there is no posts.

signup-form.label: Redirect URL
signup-form.help: Redirect to this URL after successful sign up

signup-form.label: Success Message
signup-form.help: Message to show after successful sign up.

slider.label: Offset
slider.help: number of post to displace or pass over

slider.label: Order
slider.help: Sort posts in ascending or descending order.

options.label: Video URL
options.help: Insert YouTube or Vimeo video URL.

options.label: Custom Container
options.help: Enter ID (eg. "#content") or CSS class (eg. ".wrapper") of the container

options.label: Minimum Tags
options.help: Only show when the minimum number of tags are present

options.label: Exclude Headings
options.help: Enter CSS class (eg. ".exclude-heading") of the heading tag (h1 - h6)"

video.label: Video URL
video.help: YouTube, Vimeo, etc. video embed link

options.comment: Note: most browsers require video to be muted for autoplay

video.label: Video Width
video.help: Enter fixed witdth (eg. 200px) or relative (eg. 100%). Video height is auto adjusted.

portfolio.label: Masonry Layout
portfolio.wrap_class: tb_group_element_grid6 tb_group_element_grid5 tb_group_element_grid4 tb_group_element_grid3 tb_group_element_grid2 tb_group_element_list-large-image

portfolio.label: Number of Posts
portfolio.help: Enter the number of posts to show.

portfolio.label: Offset
portfolio.help: Enter number of post to display or pass over.

portfolio.label: Order
portfolio.help: Descending means show newer posts first. Ascending means show older posts first.

portfolio.label: Hide Empty Module
portfolio.help: Hide the module when there is no posts.

contact.label: Recipient(s)
contact.help: To send to multiple recipients, comma-separate the mail addresses.

required.message: Please enter valid recipient(s) email address.

contact.label: Specify From Address
contact.help: Use a custom "from" address in the mail header instead of sender's address

contact.label: Send to BCC
contact.help: Send mail as BCC (blind carbon copy), recipients do not see each other email address.

contact.label: BCC Addresses
contact.help: To send to multiple recipients, comma-separate the mail addresses.

contact.label: Contact Posts
contact.help: Enable this will create a copy of message as contact post in admin area.

options.name: add
options.value: Assign sender's email as post author

contact.label: Success URL
contact.help: Redirect to this URL when the form is successfully sent.

contact.label: Auto Responder
contact.help: Send an auto reply message when user submits the contact form.

contact.label: Default Subject
contact.help: This will be used as the subject of the mail if the Subject field is not shown on the contact form.

options.name: enable
options.value: Include name and email in message

contact.label: Email Template
contact.help: Create a custom email content template. Basic HTML tags are supported.
